featured.text: If it can be expanded, the prickly pear could be the key to Mexico’s energy future.

definition.zh_def: 能量：物體或系統所具有的做功的能力。
definition.en_def: Energy: The capacity of a physical system to do work.
definition.example: The sun provides energy to the Earth in the form of sunlight.
